scripts.deploy: composer network deploy -a dist/hyperledger-network.bna -p hlfv1 -i PeerAdmin -s randomString
scripts.update: composer network update -a dist/hyperledger-network.bna -p hlfv1 -i PeerAdmin -s randomString
scripts.ping: composer network ping -n hyperledger-network -p hlfv1 -i admin -s adminpw
scripts.server: composer-rest-server -p hlfv1 -n hyperledger-network -i admin -s adminpw -N never -w true
